name: Hassidic Witch Murderer
description: Killers, witches, thieves, and liars. Every family's got them.  Can you unravel the secrets and lies bound up in your DNA?  Do you know who you are without the stories you been told? This interactive poetry book is a text adventure unlike any other. Navigate through an intricate web of visions, nightmares, and histories to try and find something you can call the truth.
